job.title: Software Engineer
job.industry: Information Services,Information Technology and Services,Computer Software
job.description: <p>Everyone wants a career with impact. Here, you’ll be helping some of the world’s most renowned and ambitious companies build winning cloud platforms.</p><p><br></p><p><strong>Responsibilities:</strong></p><ul><li>Work with customers to define, design, and develop complex, multi-tier distributed software applications on cloud platforms ( AWS / GCP)</li><li>Passionate about mentoring team members and bringing in new technologies within the larger team.</li><li>Work hands-on with cloud native services to demonstrate and prototype outcomes in customer/partner environments.</li><li>Work in a supportive environment with many growth opportunities.</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>Technical Requirements:</strong></p><ul><li>3+ years of experience with Java and Spring Boot framework.</li><li>Experience building, architecting, designing and implementing highly distributed global cloud-based systems on either AWS or GCP</li><li>Experience building or integrating with Continuous Integration/Delivery process.</li><li>Experience implementing platform components such as RESTful APIs, Message Queues Systems, Observability Services, State Management Systems, Caching etc.</li><li>Hands-on micro services architecture experience using Spring boot, Docker and Kubernetes</li><li>Expertise with the AWS or GCP cloud native services</li><li>Self-starter and strong, quick problem solving skills.</li><li>Ability to communicate with clients on a business level and translate their needs into a technical solution.</li><li>Bonus if you have experience with both AWS and GCP</li><li>Bonus if you have experience with Google Kubernetes Engine</li><li>Bonus if you are familiar with provisioning and automating infrastructure with infrastructure as code tool such as Terraform or Cloud Formation.</li><li>Bonus if you have experience using Anthos, BigQuery, BigTable, TensorFlow.</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>Benefits Include:</strong></p><ul><li>Competitive compensation.</li><li>Generous benefits.</li><li>Flexible vacation and PTO policies (we have a minimum vacation policy in fact!)</li></ul>
